title: Reminder about this website
content: This website is a fan site for the game Legend of Mushroom. It is not affiliated with the game's developers or publishers. The information on this site is provided for informational purposes only. The game's developers may change the game at any time, and the information on this site may become outdated. Please refer to the game's official website for the most up-to-date information. We are not responsible for any errors or omissions on this site. If you have a bug or issue with the game, please contact the game's developers directly.

title: Website feature requests
content: If you have any questions or requests about this website, the fastest way to reach us is via our discord: We will do our best to respond to your request as soon as possible.

title: Professional requests
content: If you have a professional request, please contact us at noobshroom@protonmail.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
